# Git and GitHub

## Installation and Configuration

### Installation

- **macOS:** Install Xcode Command Line Tools. Open Terminal and run:

```bash
xcode-select --install
```

<!-- TODO: screenshot - macOS prompt to install Xcode Command Line Tools -->

- **Linux:** Git may already be installed. If not, install it using:

```bash
sudo apt install git
```

<!-- TODO: screenshot - Linux apt install git terminal output -->

- **Windows:** Download Git for Windows from  
  [https://git-scm.com/download/win](https://git-scm.com/download/win) and install it with default settings.

<!-- TODO: screenshot - Git for Windows installer -->

To verify that Git is installed, run:

```bash
git --version
```
